1.title: Mike and Janene
1.plot: Janene and Mike are a couple who prove that sparks can still fly after five years. Now the proud parents of two young children, they're ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding to one of their mothers.

2.title: Nick and Ana
2.plot: Nick and Ana are a sexy couple who prove that true love can be found in a nightclub. Still head-over-heels after two years, they're ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding to one of their mothers.

3.title: Matt and Desiree
3.plot: A happy couple must hand over total control of their wedding plans to one of their mothers, who will go head to head to win the chance to plan their son or daughter's wedding.

4.title: Ashley and Andrew
4.plot: After three failed wedding attempts, Ashley and Andrew are determined to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: handing over total control of their wedding to one of their mothers.

5.title: Jin and Krystalynn
5.plot: After a speedy courtship, and a birthday proposal, Krystalynn and Jin are determined to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding to one of their mothers.

6.title: Kevin and Sandra
6.plot: Kevin and Sandra prove Internet dating can lead to true love, and now the couple is ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding...to one of their mothers!

7.title: Kevin and Pam
7.plot: Lovebirds Pam and Kevin are ready to tie the knot, but just can't find the time as they pursue their careers. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding...to one of their mothers!

8.title: Becky and Ryan
8.plot: Deeply in love, Becky and Ryan are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding...to one of their mothers!

9.title: Victor and Lindsay
9.plot: Lindsay and Victor are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding - to one of their mothers.

10.title: Matthew and Raluca
10.plot: High school sweethearts Matthew and Raluca are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding... to one of their mothers!

11.title: Damion and Daliah
11.plot: Deeply in love and passionately connected through music, Damion and Daliah are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding... to one of their mothers!

12.title: Graydon and Raya
12.plot: Seriously competitive but truly in love, Raya and Graydon are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding... to one of their mothers!

13.title: Justin and Esi
13.plot: Together for four loving years but abiding by a strict "virginity contract," Esi and Justin are ready to tie the knot. Host and wedding planner extraordinaire Gina Sole helps the couple get to the altar, with one condition: they need to hand over complete control of their wedding... to one of their mothers!
